text: Need Emma Thompson for Portmans campaign. Budget around $11,659, looking for 2 x TikTok video, 3 x 2-minute tutorial, 3 x Press release quote, 2 x Pinterest pin, 1 x 5-minute review. 8 week exclusivity from other similar brands.
